title: Nvidia CEO downplays role in lifting US ban on chip sales to China
description: Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang says export controls on advanced chips require companies to adapt

title: Nvidia CEO downplays role in lifting US ban on chip sales to China
description: BEIJING (AP) — The head of Nvidia downplayed his role in getting the U.S. government to lift a ban on selling an advanced computer chip in China and said it will take time to ramp up production once orders for the AI-processor come in. CEO Jensen Huang, speak…

title: As Nvidia gets a lifeline in China, Jensen Huang goes on the charm offensive in Beijing
description: Wearing his iconic leather jacket, Huang walked into the sunny courtyard of the Mandarin Oriental hotel earlier than scheduled and took multiple questions.
